metadata.title: CVE-2012-5564 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: android-tools 4.1.1 in Android Debug Bridge (ADB) allows local users tooverwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on /tmp/adb.log.

criterions.comment: android-tools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
